name: Color Voyage
description:
./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> Initializing... ./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> Initializing... ./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> Initializing... ./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> Initializing complete! Beginning essentia_test.exe ./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> Code name: Color Voyage

Unlock the power of the essentia colors and complete a total of 5 "unique and challenging" levels. Travel the various testing rooms given to you and complete their challenge in order to unlock new levels.

Color Voyage is a simple 2D puzzle platformer game where you control a robot that can manipulate its form by accessing the essentia colors. By accessing these forms, the robot can complete the challanges given to it.

> File Security Disabled. Opening crucial information... ./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> open red_info.txt

The Essentia Red!

The color of sight. The most simple of the 3 essentia colors.  Just allows you to see.

./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> open green_info.txt

The Essentia Green!

The color of control. Manipulate your body in order to access areas you could never access normally.

./sys/essentiabuild/main.exe> open blue_info.txt

The Essentia Blue!

The color of the soul. A wall? Ha! Just pass through it. Obviously ghosts can walk through walls.

Please Note {Developer Note}:

Please don't be too harsh on this one. Still open to criticism. This was a small game development project for my computer science class. I had a little bit over a week (1 week and 2 days) to program this in Pygame with some limitations set by my teacher. There isn't a lot of content and I focused a lot on mechanics rather than gameplay.  Also its only windowed mode :P.

If the concept is interesting to you guys, maybe I can make an actual game of this. Like. Properly.

Aside from that, I hope you enjoy the game!
